description.ko: 유기적 식물과 사이버네틱 구조의 매혹적인 융합으로, 디지털 숲 속에서 광섬유 빛으로 맥동하는 수정 꽃잎을 보여줍니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing fusion of organic flora and cybernetic architecture, where crystalline petals pulse with fiber-optic light amidst a digital forest.

prompt: A cinematic close-up of FLORA-9, a high-tech synthetic plant with translucent glass leaves, glowing internal circuitry, iridescent pollen particles floating in the air, digital glitch aesthetics, 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5 render, synthwave lighting, macro photography.
